description.message: It allows you to browse newspapers without annoying ads or subscriptions.

popup_description.message:
It removes paywalls from newspapers that require you to pay to reject cookies.

This extension does not approve any cookies. Therefore, if you are still seeing personalized ads, the website probably does not handle cookie rejection well.

This extension is simply engaging in the same questionable practices as the newspapers.

More journalism and less clickbait!!!

popup_options_link.message: Customise allowed URLs for this plugin.

options_description.message:
Add websites to be excluded from the plugin. Protocols are not required.

For instance, instead of https://www.google.es, you can simply add www.google.es or google.es.
